entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:33 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
